Please help - I am having issues creating JUnit tests in JBuilder 9 
personal (I have used JUnit before, but not J2MEUnit and I usually 
develop using IntelliJ).

Here's the problem:
I CAN build and run/debug midlets, but when I created a j2meunit for 
any class (even the j2meunit example tests) I get the following run-
time error:

-- IOException starting Java runtime process --

java.io.IOException: CreateProcess: C:\WTK20\bin\javaw -
classpath "blah blah blah" junit.swingui.TestRunner <mypackage.class> 
error=2

I've check the settings repeatedly and can't find any errors.  If 
anyone has seen this error before, or has an idea what could be 
causing it, I would appreciat it.  I did see a similar post, the 
reply suggested to check my class path, if there is an error in my 
class path, I can't see it or don't know what's missing.

Thanks in advance
